intro: Ecbolium oblongum, commonly known as the narrowleaf ecbolium, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, elongated leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and stream banks. Its fruit is a dry, two-lobed capsule that releases tiny seeds when mature. Ecbolium oblongum is often found in temperate regions of Europe and Asia.
